Papa Giorno's Pizza Palace

Founded in 2002, Papa Giorno's Pizza Palace has spent the last 20 years making one man's culinary dreams a reality.

Definitely in my top 5 pizzas of all time

Pannacotta Fugo

This... this is the taste of a good pizza!

Bruno Bucciarati

Eh... not bad, but I've had better, 3/5 stars.

Leone Abbacchio

Narancia Ghirga
